channel.title: Accessing API :: CIS 526 Textbook
channel.description: Accessing the API Finally, let’s see what it takes to actually access data that is available in our RESTful API using a properly authenticated request. For this example, we’re going to create a simple ProfileView page that the user can access by clicking the Profile button available after they’ve logged in. This page is just a test, but it will quickly demonstrate what we can do with our existing setup.
